title: How does ancient knowledge and modern science view the concept of time and its effects on human consciousness?
first_phrase: In the last part of this text, the author discusses the concept of transcending time and how it relates to modern scientific research. The author mentions various historical and philosophical figures, such as Dante and Pythagoras, highlighting their views on time. The author then goes on to discuss the modern view of time in physics, which is no longer linear and limited. The author notes that the experience and perception of time can differ from person to person, and some individuals may have experienced a different sense of time. Finally, the author encourages readers to experiment with their perception of time by reliving past moments and playing with the concept.
